dcLimits.description: Concealment DC is clamped between these values, ensuring even poor rolls provide some protection while preventing impossible DCs.

stackingRules.description: Technique bonuses stack additively (e.g., +4 + +4 = +8). Time multipliers compound multiplicatively (e.g., x1.5 * x1.25 = x1.875).

techniques.description: Walk on stone, metal, or packed earth that doesn't hold tracks well.
techniques.flavorText: The Jotun-built roads and pre-Shattering concrete leave no trace of passage. You walk where footprints cannot follow.

techniques.description: Use branches or debris to sweep away your footprints as you go.

requirements.errorMessage: Requires foliage or debris to sweep away tracks.

techniques.flavorText: Each step erased as if you were never there. The branches whisper across the ground, consuming all evidence of your passage.

techniques.description: Create misleading tracks leading in a different direction, then double back.
techniques.flavorText: Let them chase shadows while you slip away. Your deliberate deception leads pursuers on a merry chase to nowhere.

techniques.description: Wade through a stream or pond to break your scent and visual trail.

requirements.errorMessage: Requires a water body (stream, river, pond, swamp) to cross through.

techniques.flavorText: The stream carries away all evidence of your passage, breaking both scent and visual trails completely.

techniques.description: Walk backwards over your own trail to confuse pursuers about your direction.
techniques.flavorText: Your footprints tell a lie about where you went. The trail leads them in the wrong direction while you vanish into the wasteland.

effectivenessRatings.description: The trail is barely concealed. Competent trackers will still find it.
The trail is reasonably concealed. Average trackers may struggle.
The trail is well-concealed. Only skilled trackers can follow.
The trail is masterfully concealed. Only expert trackers have a chance.
